title: Stadion Miejski Hutnika (Kraków)
text: Stadion Miejski Hutnika (Kraków) (in English: "Hutnik Kraków City Stadium"), also known as the Stadion Suche Stawy (in English: "Suche Stawy Stadium"), is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Krak%C3%B3w">Kraków</a>, <a href="Poland">Poland</a>. It is mainly used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and hosts the home matches of <a href="Hutnik%20Krak%C3%B3w">Hutnik Kraków</a>. The stadium has a capacity of 6,500 spectators. It was used by <a href="England%20national%20football%20team">England</a> as a training base for the <a href="Euro%202012">Euro 2012</a>.
